participant_1.background:
I want to get a bagel with everything on it before I start my shift.
I love nature and my garden is a big part of that.
i have not gone home in over two years.
I've lost a lot of things in my life, but losing my diamond at the debutante ball was by far the most difficult.
I wouldn't be able to be a Christmas tree decorator if I were blind.

participant_2.background:
I'm a bit sad because my brother is leaving for the army.
i m the youngest of five.
my wife and i enjoy long sunday drives.
I live in my parent's basement and work a lot, so I usually don't have time for a healthy diet or exercise.
I have a dog named Snowball who keeps me company when I'm recovering from my knee surgery.

content.text: I'm sorry about your brother leaving for the army.
Thank you. It's hard, but he's wanted to do this for a while.
I can imagine. My oldest brother joined the Navy and I missed him while he was away.
I'm sure you did. How long was he gone?
He was gone for four years. It felt like an eternity.
I can imagine. I'm glad he's back now.
That's great. I wish I was closer with my brothers.
Maybe you can start doing things together now that your brother is back.
That's a good idea. I'll have to talk to him about it.
Sounds good. I hope you guys can work something out.
